item.title: Trick to use jio music without jio number
item.author: invalid@example.com (chhewang)
item.dc:creator: chhewang
item.content:encoded:
[PRO=18,21,16]
1-Install the Jio music moded APK.link https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9aHIHBf5IlfblBPR1JyVElvOFBjSi13QXJIa0JpbVM2eHBB/view

2-Open JioMusic on your smartphones.
3-Sign up for any jio number using your friends or family (If you want to contact us we will provide you the same)
4-It’s only for one time login
5-That’s it enjoy jio music for free on your mobile
Do Note:

Don’t update app it will force you to upgrade but don’t do it
It works on any network data as well as WiFi...

Trick to use jio music without jio number

item.title: NO NETWORK AND U WANT TO PORT RELIANCE SIM THEN READ THIS POST
item.author: invalid@example.com (sunilshk)
item.dc:creator: sunilshk
item.content:encoded:
Thoes who are unable to PORT there Reliance Gsm number to other operators because of no network in Reliance sim. Follow this steps.
First decide in which operator you want to port your reliance gsm number.
For example you had chosen Vodafone as your new operator.
Than simply you need to send sms from anyone's Vodafone number.
UPCN 93******67 MUM
(Note) - MUM is a region code which is mumbai.
If you are from another region apart from mumbai , the region code will be different , you can get...

NO NETWORK AND U WANT TO PORT RELIANCE SIM THEN READ THIS POST

item.content:encoded:
[PRO=21]
First download pdanet+ application in both phone through play store.
[ phone1= in which you use webtunnel.
Phone2= in which you want to use jio trick internet ]

1. Only on your internet connection. Open pdanet+ app in phone1 and click on WIFI direct hotspot. You see wifi name and password.
2. In phone2 off internet. Connect wifi then automatic pdanet+ open in phone2 .
3. Connect webtunnel in phone1
Enjoy jio trick net in phone2 also..
[/PRO]

I am using since 10-15 days.
You cam...

[For jio trick][Non-Root]Tether VPN connection over Wifi Hotspot
